Uses of Interface
com.jme3.animation.Track

  • Packages that use Track 
    Package Description
    com.jme3.animation
    The com.jme3.animation package contains various classes for managing animation inside a jME3 application.
    com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.animations  

    • Uses of Track in com.jme3.animation

      Subinterfaces of Track in com.jme3.animation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ClonableTrack
      An interface that allow to clone a Track for a given Spatial.
      Classes in com.jme3.animation that implement Track 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AudioTrack
      AudioTrack is a track to add to an existing animation, to paly a sound during an animations for example : gun shot, foot step, shout, etc...
      class  BoneTrack
      Contains a list of transforms and times for each keyframe.
      class  EffectTrack
      EffectTrack is a track to add to an existing animation, to emmit particles during animations for example : exhausts, dust raised by foot steps, shock waves, lightnings etc...
      class  PoseTrack
      Deprecated. 
      class  SpatialTrack
      This class represents the track for spatial animation.
      Methods in com.jme3.animation that return Track 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Track AudioTrack.clone()
      Clone this track
      Track EffectTrack.clone()
      Clone this track
      Track Track.clone()
      This method creates a clone of the current object.
      Track AudioTrack.cloneForSpatial(Spatial spatial)
      This method clone the Track and search for the cloned counterpart of the original audio node in the given cloned spatial.
      Track ClonableTrack.cloneForSpatial(Spatial spatial)
      Allows to clone the track for a given Spatial.
      Track EffectTrack.cloneForSpatial(Spatial spatial)
      This method clone the Track and search for the cloned counterpart of the original emmitter in the given cloned spatial.
      Track[] Animation.getTracks()
      Returns the tracks set in Animation.setTracks(com.jme3.animation.Track[]).
      Methods in com.jme3.animation that return types with arguments of type Track 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Track> TrackInfo.getTracks() 
      Methods in com.jme3.animation with parameters of type Track 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Animation.addTrack(Track track)
      Adds a track to this animation
      void TrackInfo.addTrack(Track track) 
      void Animation.removeTrack(Track track)
      removes a track from this animation
      void Animation.setTracks(Track[] tracksArray)
      Set the Tracks to be used by this animation.

    • Uses of Track in com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.animations

      Methods in com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.animations that return Track

      Track Ipo.calculateTrack(int targetIndex, Vector3f localTranslation, Quaternion localRotation, Vector3f localScale, int startFrame, int stopFrame, int fps, boolean spatialTrack)
      This method calculates the value of the curves as a bone track between the specified frames.
